title: Creative Problem-Solving Simulation Using Entrepreneurship: Language Educator Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A process for in-service language education practitioners to explore methods of designing learning environments that enhance learner agency, utilizing VR-based simulations to recreate real classroom scenarios and applying observational research techniques.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more creative problem-solving scenarios applying entrepreneurial learning principles
Learners can observe and evaluate the effectiveness of two learner autonomy-promoting strategies in VR environments
Learners can derive three constraints to consider in educational environment design through team-based observation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
